oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-10-14 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on October 14, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Homegrown Trio; Mary Lou; Hiram Higsby; Dick Reinhart; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (2:02) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (3:08) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:36) The Homegrown Trio performs "Over The Santa Fe Trail" / (5:43) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:45) Mary Lou performs "Rodeo Sweetheart" / (9:00) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (9:30) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby perform "Buffalo Gal" / (11:04) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (11:27) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "Nearer My God To Thee" / (13:22) Chuck Davis performs closing theme / (14:26) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick; Davis, Chuck;
